column3: TPS54x40 &TPS54x60 Current-Mode Step-Down Converter Design Calculator
The Design Calculator Tool calculates the critical external component values for the TPS54x40 and TPS54x60 family of parts
The calculator includes power stage design, feature design as well as Type II compensation designs using the TPS54x40 and TPS54x60 datasheet equations.
The calculator utilizes generic power stage and compensation design algebra which can be modified for most of current-mode step-down DC/DC converters.
The initial values show an example using the TPS54040 datasheet applications section
This worksheet is designed for use with Microsoft Excel 2002 or later.  It is intended to assist circuit designers in their routine, day-to-day calculations.
All worksheets contain yellow user-input cells that accept manual numeric input, light blue calculated cells, and light gray constants cells.
